CVXPY
Minimize
  Pnorm(x + -1.0, 2)
Subject To
Bounds
 x free
End
----------------------------------------
AFTER COMPILATION
Minimize
 Obj: +1 x_0
Subject to
 c1: +1 soc_t_0 -1 x_0 = +0
 c2: +1 soc_t_1 -1 x_1 = -1
 c3: + [ +1 soc_t_1 * soc_t_1 -1 soc_t_0 * soc_t_0 ] <= +0
Bounds
 x_0 free
 x_1 free
 soc_t_1 free
End
----------------------------------------
SCIP
Minimize
 Obj: +1 x2
Subject to
\   [nonlinear] <c1>: ((<x>*<x>+<x>*(-2)+1))^0.5+<x2>*(-1) <= 0;
Bounds
 x free
 x2 free
End
